title: Man 'skinned alive' by brown bears in attack that left him 'clinically dead'

A man collecting crabs was ‘skinned alive' by a group of hungry brown bears at a beach on a remote Russian island.

Reports say Alexey Ivanovsky, 36, was briefly declared ‘clinically dead’ following the savage attack.

But paramedics managed to resuscitate the victim who remains in a coma following his terrifying ordeal.

The skin on his scalp, back and buttocks was ripped away, one ear was torn off, and one of his legs needed to be amputated because of the severity of the wounds.

Ivanovsky was flown 250 miles from Kunashir, one of the Kuril Islands north of Japan, to regional capital Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk where medics sewed his ear back on as they worked to save his life.

(Image: Sakhalin.info/The Siberian Times)

(Image: Sakhalin.info/The Siberian Times)

Ivanovsky was collecting crabs when he was cornered by a group of brown bears including cubs, according to reports.

An adult bear attacked him, clasping his leg in its teeth and clawing off his skin before attempting to drag him away.

Onlookers threw stones at the bear - which reports speculate may have been a mother seeking to protect its cubs.

A man named Alexander, 37, was also wounded by the bear.

(Image: The Siberian Times)

"People threw everything to hand at (the bear),” according to one local witness account.

They said: “It dragged Alexey, but our acquaintances …chased it away only by driving at it [in a car] and dazzling with headlights.”

A video shows torn clothes and the man’s boots after the attack - and also the crabs he had collected on the remote Pacific beach.

(Image: Sakhalin.info/The Siberian Times)

In a second separate recent attack in Russia a bear managed to overpower two men repairing an automatic lighthouse in the Kamchatka region.

One man reportedly died from his injuries.

The second victim suffered injuries and was taken ashore by a military ship.

The dead man was later reported to be head of a local military unit's lighthouse inspection team.
description: Alexey Ivanovsky, 36, is fighting for his life after he was savaged by a brown bear as he collected crabs on a beach in the Kuril Islands, Russia
